Go Back Review Name: Great product. Good service from Flipkart. Review Description: Product is really good. Nice cooling and no bad smell. Flipkart delivery guys were really helpful. They helped me to bring this product to my flat at 3rd floor via stair. Technician comes from Voltas were in a huge hurry and have not even give me a demo of the product. Youtube helped me for that. They have not even wait to see the product in working condition.
